name: Pranay Vibhor Prasad
position: Officer marketing at Indian Oil Corp Limited
about: B.Tech graduate in Mining Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. Currently working as Marketing Officer in Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IBP division). Skilled in Leadership, Critical Thinking, Team Management, Public Speaking, and Mining Engineering.

current_company.name: Indian Oil Corp Limited
current_company.title: Officer marketing at Indian Oil Corp Limited

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: Topic: High Rate Deformation and Shock Studies Under Prof. Sunita Mishra •Examined various experimental techniques used for determining the high rate deformation &mechanical properties of different material.•Indepth analysis of various techniques such as dropweight machines, split hopkinson pressure bar, and taylor impact.
experience.description_html: Topic: High Rate Deformation and Shock Studies Under Prof. Sunita Mishra •Examined various experimental techniques used for determining the high rate deformation &mechanical properties of different material.•Indepth analysis of various techniques such as dropweight machines, split hopkinson pressure bar, and taylor impact. <!---->

experience.title: Technology Mining Engineering Society, IIT Kharagpur - TMES

positions.subtitle: Technology Mining Engineering Society, IIT Kharagpur - TMES
positions.description: •Managed the allotted budget of INR 1.2M to organize the three-day annual techno-mining fest GREAT STEP at IIT Kharagpur.•Led a team of 50 members to organize the departmental activities of TMES under the guidance of Prof. Ganga Prasad Karmakar.•Achieved a year over year increase of 135%; witnessing participation of more than 500+ students from pan India universities.
positions.title: Teasurer
positions.description_html:
•Managed the allotted budget of INR 1.2M to organize the three-day annual techno-mining fest GREAT STEP at IIT Kharagpur.
•Led a team of 50 members to organize the departmental activities of TMES under the guidance of Prof. Ganga Prasad Karmakar.
•Achieved a year over year increase of 135%; witnessing participation of more than 500+ students from pan India universities.

positions.subtitle: Technology Mining Engineering Society, IIT Kharagpur - TMES
positions.description: •Conducted the publicity and growth presentation at AKS University, Satna resulting in year over year increase of 105% from the institute.•Managed the logistics and accommodation for 250+ participants of India's largest annual technical mining fest GREAT STEP.
positions.title: Core Team Member
positions.description_html:
•Conducted the publicity and growth presentation at AKS University, Satna resulting in year over year increase of 105% from the institute.
•Managed the logistics and accommodation for 250+ participants of India's largest annual technical mining fest GREAT STEP.

experience.company: Technology Mining Engineering Society, IIT Kharagpur - TMES

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Project Topic :- Concept of Consultancy & Engineering Services For Opencast Mine Planning. •Analyzed & formulated the mining report covering feasibility, profitability & environmental hazards for an open cast mining project.•Incorporated ArcGis, surpac, and Autocad for better visualization of actual mining scenarios helping in better quantitative decisions.•Created site maps, performed locational and spatial analysis & managed the geographical data using cloud based ArcGis software.
experience.description_html: Project Topic :- Concept of Consultancy & Engineering Services For Opencast Mine Planning. •Analyzed & formulated the mining report covering feasibility, profitability & environmental hazards for an open cast mining project.•Incorporated ArcGis, surpac, and Autocad for better visualization of actual mining scenarios helping in better quantitative decisions.•Created site maps, performed locational and spatial analysis & managed the geographical data using cloud based ArcGis software. <!---->

experience.title: Member
experience.description: •Led a three-tier team, managing 2 events during the adventure weekend that witnessed a footfall of over 300 students.•Successfully conducted rappelling and zipline adventure events for around 200+ students in IIT Kharagpur campus.•Coordinated and delivered the presentation during the introductory seminar attended by more than 800 students.
